mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(IFNULL(TD.FLOOR_SEQ,0)) AS allCount , COUNT(DISTINCT (CASE WHEN TD.IS_USE = 'Y' THEN IFNULL(TD.FLOOR_SEQ,0) END)) AS yCount , COUNT(DISTINCT (CASE WHEN TD.IS_USE = 'N' THEN IFNULL(TD.FLOOR_SEQ,0) END)) AS nCount FROM t_building TB INNER JOIN t_device TD ON TB.BUILD_SEQ = TD.BUILD_SEQ

SELECT TD.FLOOR , (SELECT COUNT(IFNULL(TD.FLOOR,0)) FROM t_building TB INNER JOIN t_device TD ON TB.BUILD_SEQ = TD.BUILD_SEQ INNER JOIN t_tracking TT ON TD.DEVICE_SEQ = TT.DEVICE_SEQ AND TT.TRACK_TYPE_CD = 'DLO00010' ) AS allCount , COUNT(DISTINCT IFNULL(TD.DEVICE_SEQ,0)) AS count , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM t_code TC WHERE TT.TRACK_TYPE_CD = TC.CODE_VAL) AS name FROM t_building TB INNER JOIN t_device TD ON TB.BUILD_SEQ = TD.BUILD_SEQ INNER JOIN t_tracking TT ON TD.DEVICE_SEQ = TT.DEVICE_SEQ AND TT.TRACK_TYPE_CD = #{codeVal} GROUP BY TB.BUILD_SEQ, TD.DEVICE_SEQ
